table_utils.sql_template: SELECT TRD_VOL_SID, COB_DT, SRC_FILE_CD, TRD_TRAN_DT, TRD_EFF_DT, CON_SETL_DT, TRD_ENTR_DTM, SRC_SYS_ENTR_TS, CTP_UID_GRD, CUSIP, ISIN, SEDOL, ASET_LVL_KEY, FIRM_UID_GRD, FO_BOOK_SYS, EXCH, ORD_NO, TRD_ENTR_USER_ID, TRDR_ID, SLSPRSN_ID, BLTR_CD, TRAN_EXEC_METH, TRAN_EXEC_CNDT, BUY_SELL, MKT_OF_SETL_CD, ACTL_MKT_OF_SETL_CD, VOL_EVNT_TYP, TRAN_TYP, TRD_STA, EXEC_TYP, METRICS_CAT, TRD_STA_RESN, BLK_TRD_REF, EXT_TRD_REF, ENTP_TRD_REF_NO, OPS_TRD_REF, OPS_SETL_SYS_TRD_REF, FO_TRD_REF, TRD_REF_1, TRD_REF_2, TRD_REF_3, TRD_REF_4, TRD_REF_5, LCL_CCY, CON_LCL_CCY_AMT, USD_AMT, CON_USD_AMT, QTY, CON_QTY, TRDR_NAM, TRDR_RGN FROM CSMARTVOL.TRD_VOL_UNION where src_file_cd in ('ATLASCO', 'ATLASEQ', 'DOGS', 'IOWA', 'RADAR', 'TMLSALO') and cob_dt between '13-Dec-2012' and '31-Dec-2012'
